00028 #include "util/AffxBinaryFile.h"
00029 
00030 AffxBinaryFile::AffxBinaryFile()
00031 {
00032         m_pistrm = NULL;
00033         m_postrm = NULL;
00034 }
00035 
00036 AffxBinaryFile::~AffxBinaryFile()
00037 {
00038         close();
00039 }
00040 
00041 bool AffxBinaryFile::open(const AffxString& strFileName, m_enumOpenOptions enumOpenOption)
00042 {
00043         std::fstream fstrm;
00044         switch (enumOpenOption)
00045         {
00046         case LOAD:
00047                 fstrm.open(strFileName.c_str(), fstream::in | fstream::binary);
00048                 if (fstrm.is_open()) {fstrm.close();} else {return false;}
00049                 m_pistrm = new ifstream(strFileName.c_str(), ios::in | ios::binary);
00050                 if (m_pistrm == NULL) {return false;}
00051                 break;
00052         case SAVE:
00053                 m_postrm = new ofstream(strFileName.c_str(), ios::out | ios::binary);
00054                 if (m_postrm == NULL) {return false;}
00055                 break;
00056         case APPEND:
00057                 m_postrm = new ofstream(strFileName.c_str(), ios::out | ios::binary | ios::app);
00058                 if (m_postrm == NULL) {return false;}
00059                 break;
00060         default:
00061                 return false;
00062         }
00063         return true;
00064 }
00065 
00066 void AffxBinaryFile::close()
00067 {
00068         if (m_pistrm != NULL) {m_pistrm->close(); delete m_pistrm; m_pistrm = NULL;}
00069         if (m_postrm != NULL) {m_postrm->close(); delete m_postrm; m_postrm = NULL;}
00070 }
